EmailTemplate.subject: Use & Care guidelines (case: {!Case.CaseNumber})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir, Madam,
In reference to your complaint {!Case.CaseNumber} dated {!Case.Date_Entered__c}, we send you hereby our Use & Care booklet.
Most of our Use & Care guidelines, you probably already follow instinctively, but if you have any questions, please contact us.
In case you would like to refresh your counter top, we can provide you with the details of a service center or a list of QN fabricators nearby, who can provide you with a price offer.
Friendly Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
QN & Warranty Assistant
Tel: {!Case.OwnerPhone}
{!Case.OwnerEmail}
We want to inform you that we collect your information to identify your business interests, provide you with
products or services and offer a positive customer experience during business interactions. Your personal
information (name, e-Mail, phone number, and other contact data) will be stored in chosen customer system
s primarily hosted in the United States. This information may be shared within DuPont, its affiliates,
partners, and selected third parties in other countries for the same purpose. In order to access, amend,
delete or oppose to the processing of your information, use this link.
